label: Firmware Update
description: Allows a device firmware to be updated over the network

lastUpdateStatusReason.label: Firmware update result reason
lastUpdateStatusReason.description: The explanation of the reason for the status of the most recent update attempt.
lastUpdateStatusReason.displayTemplate: The reason for the most recent firmware update status on {{device.label}} was {{attribute}}

availableVersion.label: Available Version
availableVersion.description: version of the firmware to download

lastUpdateStatus.label: Firmware update status
lastUpdateStatus.description: The status of the most recent update attempt.
lastUpdateStatus.displayTemplate: The status of the most recent firmware update on {{device.label}} was {{attribute}}

state.label: Firmware update process state
state.description: The state of the firmware update process
state.displayTemplate: The state of the firmware update operation on {{device.label}} was {{attribute}}

currentVersion.label: Current firmware version
currentVersion.description: The current version reported by the device firmware, should update after OTA completes
currentVersion.displayTemplate: The current firmware version on {{device.label}} was {{attribute}}

lastUpdateTime.label: Last update attempt time
lastUpdateTime.description: The time of the most recent download or update attempt.
lastUpdateTime.displayTemplate: The last update attempt for {{device.label}} was at {{attribute}}

updateFirmware.label: Update firmware
updateFirmware.description: Update the firmware on the device

checkForFirmwareUpdate.label: Check for firmware update
checkForFirmwareUpdate.description: Check to see if there is a firmware update available for the device
